messages.messageBody:
I thought I'd share, an unschooling moment...

My kids just discovered the song 'Wipe out' and we are JAMMIN! Abbi, 7 is playing the air guitar, Kyra, 5, is playing her bottom lip. And Mom is surfing!!

Just think if the kids were in school I'd be hurrying them to bed but what are we doing? gotta love it!

Kelli T

now we're singing 'Hit the road jack and don't you come back no more, no more....'

wahoo!!



---------------------------------
